createMarketSale(uint256).notice: Creates the sale of a marketplace item and transfers ownership of the item, as well as funds between parties

createToken(string,uint256).notice: Mints a token and lists it in the marketplace

fetchItemsListed().notice: Returns only items a user has listed

fetchMyNFTs().notice: Returns only items that a user has purchased

getListingPrice().notice: Returns the listing price of the contract

resellToken(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows someone to resell a NFT they have purchased

updateListingPrice(uint256).notice: Updates the listing price of the contract
